description: Miss Lee's skirt is a little too short for little billy to resist, and his roving eyes land him more than a mouthful of what is under that delightful, pleated article. Face sitting with his balls on a leash, gagged, strung up and whipped, fucked in the ass and eventually fucked silly, little billy does his best to keep Mistress Lee happy and satisfied.
title: Billy and Lorelei Lee
